price: Na wakisema: Hivyo sisi tuiache miungu yetu kwa ajili ya huyu mtunga mashairi mwendawazimu?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ
footnotes: Na husema: Sisi tuache kuabudu miungu yetu kwa kufuata kauli ya mtunga mashairi aliye zugwa asiye kuwa na akili?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
